Description.Text:
Property Location
Andante Hotel is in the heart of Barcelona, walking distance from Filmoteca de Catalunya and Maritime Museum. This eco-friendly hotel is close to Palau de la Musica Catalana and Casa Batllo.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 134 air-conditioned rooms featuring flat-screen televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access is available to keep you connected.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Be sure to enjoy recreational amenities including an outdoor pool and a fitness center. Additional amenities include complimentary wireless Internet access and tour/ticket assistance.

Dining
Buffet breakfasts are available daily for a fee.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a 24-hour front desk, luggage storage, and an elevator (lift). Self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 3 PM Check-out time is noon
Buffet breakfasts are available daily for a fee.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Andante Hotel is in the heart of Barcelona, walking distance from Filmoteca de Catalunya and Maritime Museum. This eco-friendly hotel is close to Palau de la Musica Catalana and Casa Batllo.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Filmoteca de Catalunya - 0.2 km / 0.1 mi
Maritime Museum - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Centre d'Art Santa Monica - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Sant Pau del Camp - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Palau Guell - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Teatre Principal - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Victoria Theatre - 0.4 km / 0.2 mi
Rambla del Raval - 0.4 km / 0.2 mi
Barcelona Wax Museum - 0.4 km / 0.2 mi
Gran Teatre del Liceu - 0.4 km / 0.2 mi
Placa Reial - 0.4 km / 0.3 mi
Columbus Monument - 0.4 km / 0.3 mi
Teatre Romea - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Hospital de la Santa Creu de Barcelona - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Teatre Tantarantana - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi

The preferred airport for Andante Hotel is Barcelona (BCN-Barcelona Intl.) - 11.5 km / 7.1 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
